summary: A collection of general‑purpose utility components used throughout the Conan package manager, including INI‑style configuration parsing, ISO‑8601 date handling, file system operations, locking mechanisms, subprocess execution, and thread management.
business_intent: To supply Conan with reliable, reusable low‑level helpers that standardize handling of configuration files, timestamps, file manipulation, concurrency primitives, and external command execution, thereby simplifying the implementation of higher‑level package management features.
